sentences.english: He and his friends enjoy playing cards for low stakes.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的朋友喜歡來小筆輸贏的牌戲。

sentences.english: I hope your ladyship is pleased with the game.
sentences.chinese: 我想夫人您很喜歡這種牌戲吧。

sentences.english: Danny used to be a short-con artist who excelled at card tricks and pick- pocketing .
sentences.chinese: 丹尼曾是小拐小騙方面的藝術家，精於牌戲和摸包。
